contents.text: Thank you for calling TwentyThree, your partner in cutting-edge video marketing solutions.
For sales and product demos, press 1.
To schedule a live video marketing demo, press 1.
You’re being connected to a sales demo specialist. Please hold while we transfer your call.

navigationGoals: Book a live demo of the video marketing platform for an upcoming product launch
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your video marketing platform to support my veteran-led nonprofit outreach.
Schedule a live product demo to evaluate video API performance and analytics features
Please help me schedule a live demonstration of your video marketing platform.
Schedule a live walk-through of the video marketing platform to evaluate it for promoting my physics seminar series

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative about pricing and plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing options and plan comparisons for my marketing team
I need detailed pricing and plan information to budget for a marketing tool for my small veteran-owned business.
Discuss subscription plans, API call quotas, and enterprise licensing options
I need to understand the different subscription plans and pricing.
Ask about student-friendly subscription tiers and pricing options for your video hosting service

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Fix the video upload error I’m encountering in my account
I’m having trouble uploading videos to my account and need technical support to troubleshoot.
Troubleshoot video embed API errors and get assistance with webhook setup
I’m having trouble uploading videos to my account and need help fixing it.
Get help troubleshooting playback issues with my uploaded lecture video

contents.text: For billing, account inquiries, and assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our customer success representative.

navigationGoals: Update my payment method and clarify charges on my latest invoice
I want to review a billing discrepancy on my latest invoice for my marketing subscription.
Update billing information, request the latest invoice, and clarify overage charges
I’d like to go over my billing statement and update my payment details.
Review a recent billing charge on my account and update my payment details
